nodes.text: The Merr-Sonn Scalphunter rifle was an experimental blaster designed and created by the Trade Federation. It was fully automatic with collapsible stock, cortosis alloy barrel and long range spectrum microscope.
A number of the weapons were stolen by the pirate Nym before the Invasion of Naboo.

Although it was experimental it clearly wasn't a bad gun. In The Bounty Hunter Code, Boba Fett mentions that (along with the EE-3 Carbine rifle and Firestar 10-k) it has a good balance of firepower, accuracy and weight.
